content: DCD Dust collector Dust collector for convenient overhead drilling ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > On-board dust removal systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Optional, easily attachable dust collector helps protect the operator from falling dust and fragments when hammer drilling overhead Applications Hammer drilling overhead ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Dust collectors For use with: TE 3-C/M, TE 6-A36 (04) Product information: To attach to the tool and collect dust Technical Data | Accessory type | Dust collectors | For use with | TE 3-C/M, TE 6-A36 (04) | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 7.9 x 3.1 x 3.1 in ### ITEMS- 2090707 - Dust collector DCD - Package Size 1 pc
